headline: Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ) Launches Corona Sunbrew Nationwide With NYC Event Sweepstakes
summary: Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ) recently launched Corona Sunbrew, sparking interest with its nationwide availability and a vibrant marketing campaign. This move, combined with the broader market upswing catalyzed by a U.S.-U.K. trade deal, could have supported the company's 11% share price increase over the last quarter. Despite facing a class action lawsuit and changes in its credit facility, the strong market performance and proactive product innovations likely provided momentum, aligning...
